main.about: I am 28 years old. I have a university degree with applied information technologies.I started my programming carrier in 2019 with a commercial project - a site for restoraunt. After I was changed to backend developement (Java), and then switched back to frontend - I finished EPAM courses, lab and got an offer. Now I`m still working on a project affiliated with epam

education.1: Yuri Gagarin State Technical University of Saratov
